function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate data reporting in trial registries and data sharing platforms","Impact":"Misleading secondary analyses and implications for future research activities","Mitigation":"Mandating comprehensive data reporting and reinforcing data sharing practices","Technologies":"Data management systems, data encryption, secure data transfer protocols","People":"Researchers involved in clinical trials","Owner":"Regulators, scientific journals, research institutions"},{"Description":"Concerns over global health inequities in data sharing","Impact":"Limited access to resources for data transfer in low-income and middle-income countries","Mitigation":"Providing support and resources for data transfer in under-resourced regions","Technologies":"Secure data transfer protocols, data compression techniques, bandwidth optimization tools","People":"Researchers in low-income and middle-income countries","Owner":"International organizations, research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Challenges in sharing clinical trial data during a global pandemic","Impact":"Difficulty in sharing clinical trial data and generating research insights during a rapidly evolving pandemic","Mitigation":"Streamlining data sharing processes, leveraging technology for rapid data analysis","Technologies":"Cloud-based data sharing platforms, artificial intelligence for data analysis, secure and scalable data transfer tools","People":"Researchers, healthcare providers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, technology companies, government agencies"}]}
